profileSummary: My name is Vishal Shakya. I am passionate about technology, software development, and artificial intelligence. I enjoy learning new things and building meaningful projects.

parents.description: I come from a supportive family. My father is Vinod Kumar Shakya and my mother is Babli Devi.

education.description: I completed my Bachelor of Science degree, which helped me build a strong foundation in analytical and scientific thinking.
I completed my MCA in Computer Science, where I developed strong skills in software development and problem solving.

programming.description: I enjoy programming and mainly work with JavaScript, Node.js, and React.

web.description: I use HTML and CSS to build clean and responsive user interfaces.

ai.description: I am deeply interested in AI, especially working with LLMs and building RAG-based systems.

fullStack.description: I work as a full-stack developer, handling both frontend and backend development.

projects.name: Blockchain eCommerce Platform
projects.description: I built a blockchain-integrated eCommerce platform focused on secure and transparent transactions. This project strengthened my understanding of decentralized systems.

projects.name: Online Examination System
projects.description: I developed an online examination system with features like timers, auto-evaluation, and result generation.

goals.shortTerm: Get a job as a software engineer
goals.longTerm: Teach and conduct research in Computer Science
goals.description: My long-term dream is to become a Computer Science professor and contribute to education and research.

daily.description: I try to code daily and continuously improve my technical skills.

health.description: I stay physically active by running daily and playing football.

personalDevelopment.description: I focus on self-growth by reading and working on personal projects.

hobbies.description: In my free time, I enjoy coding, playing football, learning about AI, and cooking.
